Data Fields
Vps_CaptCreateParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API

Capture driver create arguments, used when calling Fvid2_create(). All features may not be supported by all the interfaces. The exceptions will be called out in the inteface specific headers. More...

#include <vps_capture.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 videoIfMode
 
UInt32 videoIfWidth

UInt32 muxModeStartChId
 
void * pAdditionalArgs
 

Detailed Description

Capture driver create arguments, used when calling Fvid2_create(). All features may not be supported by all the interfaces. The exceptions will be called out in the inteface specific headers.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::bufCaptMode

[IN] Buffer capture mode. For valid values see Vps_CaptBufferCaptMode.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::chInQueueLength

[IN] Maximum number of request/frame per channel that can be submitted for capture without having to dequeue the captured requests.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::chNumMap[VPS_CAPT_STREAM_ID_MAX][VPS_CAPT_CH_PER_PORT_MAX]

[IN] Channel Number to assign to each channel and stream of this handle. This is used during Fvid2_queue(), Fvid2_dequeue(). Channel number must be unique across the whole system. Users can use Vps_captMakeChNum() to generate a system unique channel number.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::muxModeStartChId

[IN] Start channel ID in pixel or line mux mode. Used to add an offset to start channel mapping. This will be used when the decoder start channel ID is other than 0. For example some decoder's channel 0 CHID starts from 4 instead of 0. This is valid only in multi-channel mode and is ignored in single channel or other modes.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::numCh

[IN] Number of channel for multi-channel modes, Must be 1 for FVID2_VIFM_SCH_* capture modes.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::numStream

[IN] Number of streams to capture, MUST be <= VPS_CAPT_STREAM_ID_MAX.

void* Vps_CaptCreateParams::pAdditionalArgs

[IN] Used by some driver to hold additional information. Please refer the device specific include, on expected use.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::periodicCbEnable

[IN] TRUE: User callback passed during FVID2 create is called periodically at a fixed duration of about 8msecs FALSE: User callback passed during FVID2 create is called only if one or more frames are captured in any of the streams, channels belonging to this handle.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::videoIfMode

[IN] Video capture mode. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfMode.

UInt32 Vps_CaptCreateParams::videoIfWidth

[IN] Video interface mode. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfWidth.
